Title: Standstill
Actors: Atewenaron David Dearhouse, Meissoon Azzaria, Iohahiio Curotte, Skawennati Madeleine Mantour
Plot: Arihote, a Kanienkehaka 'Mohawk', sometime war photographer, whose life is in a rut, witnesses a revenge killing in Montreal by Wedad, a Palestinian refugee. Suddenly, he is overwhelmed by ...
